title: Easy peasy Greek salad
ingredients: ['1-2 peppers, diced', '2 tomatoes, diced', '1/2 cucumber, diced', '1/2 onion, finely chopped', '100g feta cheese, diced', '15-20 black Kalamata olives', 'For the dressing', 'Juice of 1/2 lemon', '3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', 'salt and black pepper to taste']
